divs: Sighting Detailswe were traveling west on I-10 coming out from el paso to los angeles i first noticed the object about ten minutes before i told my wife it seemed strange to me because it was a fairly large object it seemed to be metallic and very heavy but it was not moving just stayed stationary over the same spot the whole time at first i thought it was a plane but it had no movement then maybe a helocopter but theres no rotors finally i settled on it being a blimp but it seemed to massive to be one i asked my wife what she thought of it and what shape she thought it was she said it was a circular shape and seemed heavy and made of metal. i agreed that it was circular because all this time we are still traveling westbound on the freeway the object did not move but always had a cigar shape to me which meant it was indeed circular finally afetr driving about 20 mins and fearing loosing sight of the object i pulled off in the center dividing strip and took 4 photos and a short video with my fuji f20 digital camara, the strange thing is looking on the photos the object seems smaller than i remember it and on the video i cant see it at all after snapping the photos we left loosing it behind some hills i regret not driving towards it to find out what it really was but we had a long drive ahead of us if you could please let me know any info you have on this i would apprieciate you letting me know
Summary: cigar shaped object over deming new mexico
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Deming
There were no other sightings in Deming on or around December 26th 2006
This sighting has never been favorited.
